title: He’s In A Situation With His Wife
itunes:title: He’s In A Situation With His Wife
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 36 year old single woman and I’m dating a man that has been separated from his wife for 4 years, but they are not divorced. He lives in their family home and she’s moved out. I asked him why his wife was the one to move out of their home and he said because she cheated on him and ended up moving in with that guy.............................................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
